strapiPost.title: YRCC launches Adopt-A-Kid Fundraising Campaign
strapiPost.content:
Yvonne Richardson Community Center (YRCC) has launched an Adopt-A-Kid Fundraising Campaign.

  • Avenues: The funds raised in the campaign will be allocated toward YRCC’s endowment to help pay for effective programming for ages K-5 and 6-12th grade, as well as college scholarships and expansion opportunities. 
  • Purpose: Friends of YRCC started the “Adopt-A-Kid” campaign to connect with underserved children and get kids off the streets of Fayetteville. You can "Adopt-A-Kid" on a year-to-year basis, or any monetary support is much appreciated. 

Learn more HERE.
